original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 9.17. Saraṇaduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: sa raṇa duka sani dassana ttika

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na araṇam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ ca na araṇaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na sa nidassana sappaṭighañca na araṇam na sa nidassana sappaṭighañca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naaraṇaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: na araṇam na a nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ

original: naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na araṇam na anidassana sappaṭigha

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ ca na araṇaḥ na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na anidassana sappaṭigham ca na araṇam na anidassana sappaṭigham ca dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate pañca

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe pañhā vāre pi sabbattha vitthāretabba

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme …pe… magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka adhipatiyā sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye kamme pe magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate eka sabbattha vitthāro
